PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_RailwaySignalOccurrence
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties common to the definition of occurrences of IfcSignal applied in railways.

PropertyDef.Name: ApproachSpeed
PropertyDef.Definition: The design speed of trains approaching the signal if different from the line speed.

PropertyDef.Name: HandSignallingProhibited
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates if hand signalling is prohibited in case of any failure.

PropertyDef.Name: LimitedClearances
PropertyDef.Definition: Special conditions for placing the signal post telephone: tunnels, bridges, viaducts.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfLampsNotUsed
PropertyDef.Definition: Number of lamps which are not needed and blanked out (sealed).

PropertyDef.Name: RequiresOLEMesh
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether an OLE mesh is required to protect the signal or maintainer.

PropertyDef.Name: RequiresSafetyHandrail
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether a safety handrail is required.

PropertyDef.Name: SignalPostTelephoneID
PropertyDef.Definition: The identifier of the signal post telephone attached to the signal.

PropertyDef.Name: SignalPostTelephoneType
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the type of the signal post telephone, e.g. locked, direct line, dial phone.

PropertyDef.Name: SpecialPositionArrangement
PropertyDef.Definition: Type of special position at which the signal is placed.

PropertyDef.Name: HinderingObstaclesDescription
PropertyDef.Definition: Description of obstacles that hinder the visibility for the staff in the station.

PropertyDef.Name: SignalWalkwayLength
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the length of the walkway from signal to signal post telephone.

PropertyDef.Name: RequiresBannerSignal
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether a banner repeater signal is required.

PropertyDef.Name: DistanceToStopMark
PropertyDef.Definition: Distance from the signal to the nearest stop mark at a platform.
